paper_abstract: Kloosterman sums are exponential sums on finite fields that have important applications in cryptography and coding theory. We use Stickelberger's theorem and the Gross-Koblitz formula to determine the value of the binary Kloosterman sum at modulo 64, modulo 128, and modulo 256 in terms of coefficients of the characteristic polynomial of a.
paper_title: Binary Kloosterman Sums Modulo 256 and Coefficients of the Characteristic Polynomial
